description.fr: Lorsqu'une {Summoning:898!} ATTAQUE\_: Confère {value:v,percent} de son {%AT} en {%AR} à vos personnages. \--- Limité à {value:limit} fois par tour
description.en: When a {Summoning:898!} ATTACKS: Confers {value:v,percent} of its {%AT} as {%AR} on your characters. \--- Limit: {value:limit} {limit, plural, one[time] other[times]} per turn.
description.es: Cuando un {Summoning:898!} ATACA: Confiere un {value:v,percent} de su {%AT} en {%AR} a tus personajes. \--- Limitado a {value:limit} {limit, plural, one[vez] other[veces]} por turno
description.de: Wenn eine {Summoning:898!} ANGREIFT: Verleiht deinen Charakteren {value:v,percent} ihres {%AT,plural:two} als {%AR}. \--- Auf {value:limit}-mal pro Runde begrenzt.
description.pt: Quando uma {Summoning:898!} ATACA: Concede {value:v,percent} de seu {%AT} em {%AR} aos seus personagens. \--- Limite de {value:limit} {limit, plural, one[vez] other[vezes]} por turno
